attributes.action: Give a referendum to the residents of proposed 'casino' towns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed supercasino is a catastophre waiting to happen. In my town I have not even had an opportunity to voice my opinions on it before it is being forced upon us. I think all towns that are bidding for the supercasino licence should give local residents a public referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
